an5.226:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks for a mendicant who visits families for too long, mixing closely with them.
an5.226:1.3: You often see members of the opposite sex.
an5.226:1.5: Being so close, you become intimate.
an5.226:1.7: When your mind is swamped by lust, you can expect that you will lead the spiritual life dissatisfied, or commit one of the corrupt offenses, or resign the training and return to a lesser life.
an5.226:1.8: These are the five drawbacks for a mendicant who visits families for too long, mixing closely with them.”
